name: Ice Age 2: The Meltdown
description:
Nintendo.com Description (from Ad Blurbs)



Their world is melting, and your Ice Age 2 The Meltdown pals need help escaping the biggest flash flood in prehistory. Swim, splash and scurry through all the action and adventure from the new Ice Age 2 The Meltdown movie and unearth fun, laughter and surprises along the way.

Features

• Single Player• Dive into a huge variety of exciting mini-games - like Sid's slippery sloth slide challenge• Journey through the amazing worlds of the Ice Age 2 movie. And explore a few new ones, too!
